me ee pilibandawayi. 01.thanhankara budurajanan wahanse sunanda piya raju ha manonanya maw dewiya mawu padawiya laba upan thanhankara budurajanan wahanse dina hathak dushkara kriya kota ruk aththana gasaka mula budubawata pathwiya. 02.medhankara budurajanan wahanse sudewa raju ha yasodhara dewiyata mawupiyan wu medhankara budun sathi 02 k dushkara kriya kota kala namathi bodhi mulayedi budu bawata pathwiya. 03.saranankara budurajanan wahanse sumangala raju ha yasawathi dewiya mawupiyan wu saranankara budurajanan wahanse pulila bodhi mulayedi masayaka kalayak dushkara kriya kota budu bawata pathwiya. 04.dipankara budurajanan wahanse sudewa raju ha sumedha dewiya mawupiyan wu dipankara budurajanan wahanse masa 10 k dushkara kriya kota pulila bodhi mulayedi budu bawata pathwiya. 05.konadanynya budurajanan wahanse sunanda rajuth,ramyawathi dewiyath mawupiyan wu konadanynya budun wahanse masa 10 k dushkara kriya kota sal gasaka sewane budu bawa laba gaththeya. 06.mangala budurajanan wahanse mangala budun wahanse masa 08 k dushkara kriya kota na gas sewanakadi budubawata pathwiya.uththara raju ha uththara dewiya mawupiyan wiya. 07.sumana budurajanan wahanse sudaththa raju ha sirima bisawa mawpiyan wu sumana budurajanan wahanse masa 10 k dushkara kriya kota na gasaka sewane budu bawa laba gaththeya. 08.rewatha budurajanan wahanse wipula raju ha wipula bisawa mawpiyan wu rewatha budurajanan wahanse masa07k dushkara kriya kota na gasaka sewane budu bawa laba gaththeya. 09.sobhitha budurajanan wahanse sobhitha budurajanan wahanse sathiyaka kalayak dushkara kriya kota na gasaka mula budu bawata pathwiya.sudhamma raju ha sudhamma dewiya mawpiyan wiya. 10.anomadassi budurajanan wahanse yasawanna raju ha yashodhara dewiya mawupiyan wu anomadassi budun wahanse masayak dushkara kriya kota kumbauk gasa sewanedi budu bawata pathwiya. 11.paduma budurajanan wahanse sudewa raju ha anoma dewiya mawpiyan wu paduma budun wahanse sathiyak dushkara kriya kota murutha bodhi mulayedi budubawata pathwiya. 12.narada budurajanan wahanse murutha bodhi mulayedi budubawata pathwiya. 13.padumuththara budurajanan wahanse kiripalu gasaka yata budubawata pathwu padumuththara budun wahanse sathiyak dushkarakriya kota atha.sujatha dewiya ha aananda raju mawpiyan we. 14.sumedha budurajanan wahanse bakmi gasak sewane budu bawa labu masa 08 k dushkarakriya kale sumedha budun wahanseyi.ema himiyange mawpiyan wuye sumana dewiya ha sudaththa rajathumaya. 15.sujatha budurajanan wahanse udgatha raju ha prabhawathi dewiya mawupiyan wu sujatha budun wahanse masa 10k dushkara kriya kota huna gasaka sewane budu bawata pathwiya. 16.piyadassi budurajanan wahanse sudaththa raju ha suwendra bisawa demapiyan wu piyadassi budun wahanse masayaka kalayak dushkara kriya karamin kumbauk sewanakadi budubawata pathwiya. 17.aththadassi budurajanan wahanse sapugasaka sewane masa 08 k dushkarakriya kota aththadassi budun wahanse budu bawata pathwiya.demapiyan sagara raju ha sudarshana dewiya we. 18.dhammadassi budurajanan wahanse sunanda dewiya ha sarana raju mawpiyan wu dhammadassi budu himi dhammadassi budun wahanse sathiyak dushkara kriya kota karawi gasak yata budu bawata pathwiya. 19.siduhath budurajanan wahanse kinihira bodhiya kara gena siduhath budu himi budu bawa labu athara masa 10k dushkara kriya kota atha.piya udeni rajuda, mawa suppa bisawa wiya. 20.thissa budurajanan wahanse kohombaa gasaka mulaye budubawa labu thissa budurajun masa 08 k dushkara kriya kota atha.
